data.title: Truce Bakura by Kathy Tyers
data.meta_description: The Truce at Bakura (v. 4) (Star Wars) by Tyers, Kathy and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Paperback. Condition: Very Good. Based on the original "Star Wars" saga, this novel is set in the fateful days following the events in "Return of the Jedi". It plants a seed of hope for peace, sees the formation of a timeless love and stands witness to a Jedi's undying sacrifice to defend humanity against an alien nemesis. The book has been read, but is in excellent condition. Pages are intact and not marred by notes or highlighting. The spine remains undamaged.

Novel - Softcover. Condition: Good. Bantam Books Star Wars Novels (Bantam Books) Truce at Bakura, The (VG)Manufacturer: Bantam BooksProduct Line: Star Wars Novels (Bantam Books)Type: Novel - SoftcoverCopyright Date: 1997Author: Kathy TyersPage Count: 342Please review the condition and any condition notes for the exact condition of this item. All pictures are stock photos. The condition of the item you will receive is VG. Our grading system is explained in the terms of sale section of our bookseller page. Please feel free to contact us with any questions. Product Description:While recovering from their victory against the Empire at Endor, the Rebel Alliance intercepts an Imperial probe containing a distress call for the Emperor. The message details a lizardlike race of aliens invading the Outer Rim planet Bakura. With Palpatine dead and the Imperial Navy scattered, Luke Skywalker volunteers to lead a force to intercept the alien invasion and save Bakura.

Condition: Good. SHIPS FROM USA. Used books have different signs of use and do not include supplemental materials such as CDs, Dvds, Access Codes, charts or any other extra material. All used books might have various degrees of writing, highliting and wear and tear and possibly be an ex-library with the usual stickers and stamps. Dust Jackets are not guaranteed and when still present, they will have various degrees of tear and damage. All images are Stock Photos, not of the actual item. book.

Hardcover. Condition: Very good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very good. First UK edition-first impression. VGC.Bantam Press, 1994. First UK edition-first impression. Blue hardback(gilt lettering to the spine, two small nicks on the edges of the cover and spine) with Dj(small creases and nicks on the edges of the Dj cover), both in VGC. Nice and clean pages with small ink mark, nick and slightly tainted on the outer edges, light shelf wear on the Dj cover. 311pp. Price un-clipped.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. West End Games Star Wars Roleplaying Game - Sourcebooks (West End Games) Truce at Bakura, The (VG+/NM)Manufacturer: West End GamesProduct Line: Star Wars Roleplaying Game - Sourcebooks (West End Games)Type: HardcoverCode: WEG40085Copyright Date: 1996Author: Kathy Tyers, Eric TrautmannPage Count: 150Please review the condition and any condition notes for the exact condition of this item. All pictures are stock photos. The condition of the item you will receive is VG+/NM. Our grading system is explained in the terms of sale section of our bookseller page. Please feel free to contact us with any questions. Product Description:Kathy Tyers's exciting Star Wars novel comes to life in this hardcover sourcebook. The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook is the official reference companion to the best-selling novel!.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First edition. Fine in fine dustwrapper. Hardcover. Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First edition. Near fine in very good dustwrapper. Bottom corners slightly bent. Shelf rubbing to dustwrapper.
